channel.title: Testscape
channel.description:
I downloaded testscape from one of the forums......buti was wondering if some one could give me a copy of test scape with a few modified files and stuff in it.
wit the testscape i downloaded i cant add lvls or items to accounts i make, i add the item id and stuff and lvls and then click save and it automaticly goes bak to what it was can someone help me fix this problem and post what u think is the best server

item.title: Testscape
item.dc:creator: @Dominionscape Dominionscape
item.description:
@Dominionscape wrote:

i see ppl having trouble making admins it so much easier to do it this way

open client.java and wherever your commands are add this

[code]if (command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights >= 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 2;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a server administrator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("givemod") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(8);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a player moderator");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } else if (command.startsWith("giveowner")
            && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(10);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 3;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now the co-owner");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }[/code]

now whenever your putting an admin or mod just do
::giveadmin *******
or
::givemod *******

Hope this helps

Read full topic
